title: Epic 6: Pipeline and Privacy
description: Auto application tracking, email parsing, follow-up suggestions, stealth mode. FRs: F6, F11, F12. MVP Partial. 14 stories.

title: Pipeline Agent Implementation
description: Email scanning for job emails. Detect status changes. Update applications. Audit trail.

title: Stealth Mode Activation
description: One-toggle stealth. Pause activity for blocklisted employers. Visual indicator.

title: Employer Blocklist Encrypted
description: AES-256 encrypted blocklist. Agents check before action. Never exposed.

title: Privacy Proof Documentation
description: Generate stealth proof. Shows what is hidden from whom. Downloadable.

title: GDPR/CCPA Pipeline Flows
description: Consent management, data minimization, erasure for pipeline data.

title: Pipeline Empty State
description: Empty pipeline: encouraging copy, link to matches.

title: Gmail OAuth Integration
description: Google OAuth read-only. Clear permissions. Connect/disconnect in settings.

title: Outlook OAuth Integration
description: Microsoft OAuth for Outlook. Same as Gmail. MSAL library.

title: Email Parsing for Status Detection
description: NLP parse recruiter/ATS emails. Detect rejection, interview, offer. >90% accuracy.

title: Kanban Pipeline View
description: Applied->Screening->Interview->Offer->Accepted/Rejected. Drag-drop. Card details.

title: Auto-Status Updates
description: Cards auto-move from email events. Animation, notification, manual override.

title: Follow-up Agent Implementation
description: Auto-timed follow-up drafts. Professional templates. Human approval required.

title: Follow-up Timing Algorithm
description: Optimal intervals by stage and industry. Configurable. Anti-spam.

title: Follow-up Draft Generation
description: Context-aware follow-up emails. Reference previous interaction.

title: Test Epic
description: Test

title: Create /dev-flow slash command with complexity routing
close_reason: Created /dev-flow slash command, complexity_check.sh script, and DEV-FLOW-PLAN.md reference

title: Epic 5: Application Automation
description: Auto-tailored resumes, cover letters, one-tap application approval. FRs: F5, F9, F10. MVP Partial. 14 stories.

title: Resume Agent Implementation
description: Analyze JD, identify relevant experience, generate tailored resume. <45s. Rationale.

title: Application Submission Confirmation
description: Success notification. Pipeline updated. Timestamp, materials, method.

title: Application Failure Handling
description: Error feedback with reason. Apply Manually link. Auto-retry 1hr.

title: Indeed Easy Apply Integration
description: Fill Easy Apply from profile. Tailored resume. Handle questions. Max 50/day.

title: Application History and Materials
description: All applications by date. Filter, view materials, export CSV.

title: Application Empty State
description: Encouraging empty state. CTA to review matches.

title: Master Resume Management
description: Upload master, archive previous. One active. Parsed structured data. Editable.

title: Resume Diff View
description: Side-by-side Master vs Tailored. Color-coded changes. Rationale tooltips. Selective approve.

title: ATS Optimization Logic
description: Natural keyword incorporation. ATS-friendly format. Score 0-100. Warning below 70.

title: Cover Letter Generator
description: AI cover letters: company-specific, 250-400 words, <30s, editable.

title: Cover Letter Personalization
description: Company news, mission, team references. Generic fallback. Show sources.

title: Apply Agent Implementation
description: Auto-submit: direct API, browser automation, email fallback. Daily limits.

title: Approval Queue for Applications
description: Review queue for L1/L2. Preview materials. Approve/Reject/Edit. Batch approve.

title: One-Tap Approval from Briefing
description: Approve from briefing. Summary preview. Optimistic UI. 30s undo.

title: Epic 8: Interview Preparation
description: Auto interview prep briefings with company research, interviewer background, STAR suggestions. FR: F13. Post-MVP. 8 stories.

title: Interview Intel Agent
description: Auto prep briefings 24h before interviews. Company research, role questions.

title: Company Research Synthesis
description: Aggregate company info: culture, news, challenges, mission.

title: Interviewer LinkedIn Research
description: Public profile research. Background, interests, common ground.

title: Common Questions for Role Type
description: Role-specific questions database. Technical + behavioral.

title: STAR Response Suggestions
description: STAR format responses from user experience + job requirements.

title: Prep Briefing Delivery
description: 24h before interview. In-app + email. All research included.

title: Calendar Integration
description: Detect interview events from Google/Outlook calendar.

title: Interview Prep Empty State
description: No interviews scheduled. Tips on preparing.

title: Epic 0: Platform Foundation
description: Infrastructure enabling all subsequent epics. Covers NFR1-NFR4, NFR6, NFR8-NFR9, Tech2, Tech4, Tech5, Tech8, Tech9. MVP Required. 15 stories.

title: Database Schema Foundation
description: Deploy core schema: users, profiles, jobs, applications, matches, documents, agent_actions, agent_outputs. UUID PKs, timestamps, soft-delete.

title: WebSocket Infrastructure
description: Real-time agent updates at /ws/agents/{user_id}. JWT auth, auto-reconnect, REST fallback.

title: Email Service Configuration
description: SendGrid transactional emails. HTML templates, bounce webhooks, CAN-SPAM compliance.

title: CI/CD Pipeline
description: pytest >80% line/>70% branch, Jest, Schemathesis. Auto-deploy staging, manual prod.

title: Supabase Storage Configuration
description: Private bucket for resumes. 10MB max, signed URLs, virus scanning.

title: Performance Baseline
description: k6 load tests. Baselines: page <2s, API p95 <500ms, agent <30s. CI regression check.

title: GDPR Data Portability Endpoints
description: Data export and account deletion endpoints. 30-day deletion, 14-day cancel window.

title: Row-Level Security Policies
description: RLS on all user-scoped tables. user_id = auth.uid(). Dev bypass. 403 on violations.

title: Clerk Authentication Integration
description: LinkedIn OAuth via Clerk. JWT issuance, auto-refresh, token rotation. Route new vs returning users.

title: API Foundation with Versioning
description: /api/v1/ REST, health checks, CORS, JWT middleware, tier-based rate limiting.

title: Redis Cache and Queue Setup
description: Redis caching, Celery broker, agent control pub/sub channels, connection pooling.

title: Celery Worker Infrastructure
description: Background tasks: 5min timeout, 30s heartbeat, 3x retry with backoff, dead letter queue.

title: OpenTelemetry Tracing
description: Distributed tracing for API requests and agent executions. Export to Jaeger/Honeycomb.

title: LLM Cost Tracking Middleware
description: Per-request token/cost tracking. Monthly per-user aggregation. Alert at 80% of  budget.

title: Error Tracking Integration
description: Sentry with stack traces, user context (no PII). >1% error rate triggers PagerDuty.

title: Epic 4: AI-Powered Job Matching
description: AI-curated job matches with scores, rationale, swipe-to-review interface. FR: F4. MVP Required. 10 stories.

title: Job Scout Agent Implementation
description: Nightly batch: query job sources, filter by preferences, create matches with rationale.

title: Job Matches Empty State
description: Zero matches: expand preferences suggestions, Adjust Preferences button.

title: Indeed Job Board Integration
description: Fetch from Indeed. Rate limiting, dedup, structured data. Errors dont stop batch.

title: LinkedIn Job Scraping
description: Scrape public LinkedIn job listings. ToS-aware. Graceful degradation.

title: AI Job Matching Algorithm
description: Score 0-100: title, skills, location, salary, company, seniority. GPT-3.5. <5s/job.

title: Match Rationale Generation
description: Top 3 reasons, concerns, confidence. References user profile specifically.

title: Swipe Card Interface
description: Tinder-style: right=save, left=dismiss, up=apply. Touch + desktop + keyboard.

title: Top Pick of the Day
description: Highest-scoring featured with badge, larger card, extended rationale.

title: Job Detail Expansion
description: Tap to expand: full description, company info, H1B status. Smooth animation.

title: Preference Learning from Swipes
description: Detect patterns, store implicit preferences, improve scoring. Transparent.

title: Epic 1: Lightning Onboarding
description: Users sign up and have profile extracted from LinkedIn URL or resume in 30 seconds. FR: F1. MVP Required. 6 stories.

title: LinkedIn URL Profile Extraction
description: Paste LinkedIn URL, auto-extract profile data. <60s, editable fields, loading indicator.

title: Resume File Upload and Parsing
description: Upload PDF/DOCX (<10MB), extract structured profile. Store original in Supabase.

title: Profile Review and Correction UI
description: Editable form for extracted fields. Add/remove/edit. Requires name + 1 work experience.

title: First Briefing Preview
description: Sample briefing with personalized greeting, placeholder matches. Magic moment.

title: Onboarding Empty State
description: Encouraging messages for slow extraction or limited results.

title: Onboarding Analytics Events
description: Track funnel: started, extraction_completed, confirmed, preview_viewed, completed.

title: Epic 2: Preference Configuration
description: Users configure job preferences, locations, salary, deal-breakers that guide agent behavior. FR: F2. MVP Required. 8 stories.

title: Job Type and Title Preferences
description: Select job categories, target titles, seniority levels. Multiple selections.

title: Location and Remote Work Settings
description: Work arrangement, target cities with autocomplete, exclusions, relocation.

title: Salary Range Configuration
description: Min/target salary, flexibility, total comp preference. Stored privately.

title: Deal-Breaker Definition
description: Must-haves and never-rules. Strictly enforced by agents.

title: H1B Sponsorship Requirement
description: Visa type, expiration, sponsorship toggles. Non-sponsor jobs flagged.

title: Autonomy Level Selection
description: L0-L3 levels with clear descriptions. Affects features and pricing.

title: Preference Summary and Confirmation
description: Scannable summary, edit inline, Start My Agent button.

title: Preference Empty States
description: Guidance for skipped preferences. Tips for better matching.

title: Epic 10: Enterprise Administration
description: Bulk employee onboarding, aggregate metrics, per-employee autonomy, ROI tracking. FR: F15. P1 parallel. 8 stories.

title: Enterprise Admin Role and Permissions
description: Admin role with org-wide visibility. Permission boundaries.

title: Bulk Onboarding via CSV
description: CSV upload for 100+ employees. Validation, errors, invitations.

title: Aggregate Metrics Dashboard
description: Org metrics: active users, applications, interviews, placements.

title: Per-Employee Autonomy Configuration
description: Admin set/override autonomy per employee. Bulk and individual.

title: At-Risk Employee Alerts
description: Low engagement detection. Alert admins.

title: ROI Reporting
description: ROI vs industry benchmarks. Cost per hire, time to placement.

title: PII Detection Alerts
description: Alert on PII in unexpected contexts. Data governance.

title: Enterprise Empty State
description: No employees onboarded. Quick-start guide.

title: Epic 7: H1B Specialist Experience
description: H1B sponsorship research, approval rates, verified sponsor badges. FR: F8. Required for H1B tier. 10 stories.

title: H1B Data Aggregation Pipeline
description: Aggregate visa sponsor data from multiple sources. 500K+ records. Weekly refresh.

title: H1B Empty State
description: No sponsor data messaging with community contribution prompt.

title: H1BGrader Integration
description: API/scraping integration with H1BGrader for sponsorship data.

title: MyVisaJobs Integration
description: API/scraping integration with MyVisaJobs for visa statistics.

title: USCIS Public Data Integration
description: USCIS public disclosure data for H1B petitions and approvals.

title: Sponsor Scorecard UI
description: Company scorecard: approval rates, petition history, average salary.

title: Approval Rate Visualization
description: Charts: historical approval rates by company. Year-over-year trends.

title: Data Freshness Infrastructure
description: Scheduled scraping/refresh. Staleness indicators. Source attribution.

title: Verified Sponsor Badge
description: Badge on job cards for verified H1B sponsors. Aggregated data confidence.

title: LCA Wage Data Display
description: Show LCA prevailing wage data for positions at sponsors.

title: Epic 3: Agent Orchestration Core
description: Daily briefings summarizing agent activity. Emergency brake for instant agent pause. FRs: F3, F7. MVP Required. 11 stories.

title: Orchestrator Agent Infrastructure
description: Central orchestrator routing to specialized agents. Shared memory, autonomy gates.

title: Briefing Empty State
description: First briefing with zero matches: encouraging message, tips, agent activity.

title: Briefing Reliability Fallback
description: Lite briefing from cache on failure. Ops alert. Retry in 1 hour.

title: Daily Briefing Generation Pipeline
description: Compile from all agents: matches, applications, pipeline, follow-ups. <2min.

title: Briefing Delivery - In-App
description: Dashboard briefing with greeting, summary cards, expandable sections.

title: Briefing Delivery - Email
description: Email within 15min of configured time. HTML, quick actions, timezone-aware.

title: User-Configurable Briefing Time
description: Settings: hour, channels, timezone display. Default 8 AM.

title: Emergency Brake Button
description: Always-visible red button. No confirmation. Immediate pause signal.

title: Emergency Brake State Machine
description: RUNNING->PAUSING->PAUSED. In-flight complete current step. 2min force-kill.

title: Resume Agents After Pause
description: Resume button, pick up where left off. Interrupted tasks re-queued.

title: Agent Activity Feed
description: Real-time WebSocket feed. Clickable items, last 20 with View All.

title: Epic 9: Network Building
description: Autonomous relationship warming, warm path mapping, introduction drafts. FR: F14. Post-MVP. 7 stories.

title: Network Agent Implementation
description: Autonomous relationship warming. Identify target contacts at target companies.

title: Warm Path Finder
description: Map 2nd-degree connections. Identify introduction paths.

title: Introduction Request Drafts
description: Personalized intro request messages. Context-aware, professional.

title: Content Engagement Tracking
description: Track likes/comments on target contacts. Warming metrics.

title: Relationship Temperature Scoring
description: Cold->Warm->Hot scoring. Track interactions over time.

title: Human Approval for Outreach
description: All direct outreach requires approval. Preview/approve/edit/reject.

title: Network Building Empty State
description: Building network map messaging. Progress indicator.
